name: Bus Driving School 2017 - VR Simulator Edition
name_original: Bus Driving School 2017 - VR Simulator Edition
description:
Are you ready for bus driving school?

Drive through the course avoiding instructors, obstacles and pedestrians. Park in the green spot to clear each test. Can you finish all the tests and get your bus driver license?

Features:
-Realistic Driving physics
-Animated obstacles to avoid
-10 Challenging levels
-3 Busses to choose from.
